introBlock.title: Hello World!
introBlock.intro:
I am Lenin Hasda, a life long learner, passionate programmer, hobbyist drawer sketch artist, hacker (sometimes) and a maker.

Professionally I'm a Full Stack Software Engineer based in Dhaka, Bangladesh
